item.text: The {Learning IDE} is an open source IDE for
An acronym for this could be MILI (Mobile-first Interactive Learning IDE).
The [[Learning IDE]] is an open source cross platform IDE and mobile development environment customised for decentralised education.
Based on a modern cross-platfrom C++ library and user extensible set of native components the [[Learning IDE}} provides a number of services to the project:

1. [[Rapid Prototyping]]
  2. [[Participation of Schools]]
  3. [[Mobile First Development]]
  4. [[HTML5 App Export]]
Based on a modern cross-platfrom C++ library and user extensible set of native components the [[Learning IDE]] provides a number of services to the project:

1. [[Rapid Prototyping]]
  2. [[Participation of Schools]]
  3. [[Mobile First Development]]
  4. [[Polyglot Development]]
  5. [[HTML5 App Export]]
